sentences.english: Ok, May I have a look at your room card?
sentences.chinese: 能不克不及让我看下您的房卡？

sentences.english: on the other hand, the contribution of day schools can't be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，日制黉舍的进献是不克不及轻忽的。

sentences.english: without accepting new techniques, there will be no great increase in labor productivity.
sentences.chinese: 不接纳旧技法，便不克不及大幅度前进苏息生产率。

sentences.english: B man can't ride your back unless it is bent.
sentences.chinese: 你的腰不弯，旁人就不克不及骑在你的违上。

sentences.english: Can you help me wash the clothes now? 2.
sentences.chinese: 你们能不克不及派小我上来收洗衣？

sentences.english: Dould we get together at L. B. Restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 咱们能不克不及在洛城餐厅会面？

sentences.english: His family was so poor that he couldn"t go to school."
sentences.chinese: 因为家道贫寒，他不克不及上课。

sentences.english: Therefore can not be a long lever or long board hand to board action.
sentences.chinese: 是以不克不及用长杠杆或长板手来板动。

sentences.english: I can't answer for it that the boy is honest.
sentences.chinese: 我不克不及保证这个男孩是诚笃的。
现在你仍然攻无不克了。
